The companions of Abdullah used to recite it as "And your Lord has enjoined that you worship none but Him," he said: Your Lord has commanded. Regarding the verse: "When they both reach old age with you" (Surah Bani Isra'il 17:23), he said: When they both reach old age with you, meaning they become forgetful and incontinent, so do not revile them just as they did not revile you when you were a child.
